00068 #ifndef OPEN_IFACE
00069 #ifndef _NO_EXCEPTIONS
00070 #define OPEN_IFACE( name, file, version ) \
00071         name##Base = reinterpret_cast<struct Library*>(IExec->OpenLibrary( file, version ));         \
00072         if ( !name##Base ) {                                                                         \
00073             throw SPS_Exception( __FILE__, __LINE__, ERR_OPEN_LIB, file );                           \
00074         }                                                                                            \
00075         I##name = reinterpret_cast<struct name##IFace*>(IExec->GetInterface( name##Base, "main", 1, NULL )); \
00076         if ( !I##name ) {                                                                            \
00077             throw SPS_Exception( __FILE__, __LINE__, ERR_OPEN_IFACE, file );                         \
00078         }
00079 #else // _NO_EXCEPTIONS
00080 
00081 #define OPEN_IFACE( name, file, version ) \
00082         name##Base = reinterpret_cast<struct Library*>(IExec->OpenLibrary( file, version ));         \
00083         if ( name##Base ) {                                                                          \
00084             I##name = reinterpret_cast<struct name##IFace*>(IExec->GetInterface( name##Base, "main", 1, NULL )); \
00085         }
00086 #endif
00087 #endif
00088 
00095 #ifndef CLOSE_IFACE
00096 #define CLOSE_IFACE( name ) \
00097         if ( I##name ) {                                                                            \
00098             IExec->DropInterface( reinterpret_cast<struct Interface*>( I##name ));                  \
00099             I##name = NULL;                                                                         \
00100         }                                                                                           \
00101         if ( name##Base ) {                                                                         \
00102             IExec->CloseLibrary( reinterpret_cast<struct Library*>(name##Base));                    \
00103             name##Base = NULL;                                                                      \
00104         }
00105 #endif
00106 
00107 #endif /*SPS_TYPES_H_*/
